response.overview: Fernandinho was a well-known man in a small town in Goi√°s, where he had many enemies. At his wake, his daughter Laura tries to unravel the cause of his death by meeting local residents, who harbored a certain hatred for her father. What Laura didn't expect was that the path to the truth would come at a price: reliving her past.
response.tagline: loss and guilt go hand in hand
response.title: May God rest his soul
